summary: The movie shows the origin of the Powerpuff Girls before the cartoon series. It explains why they were born and why they dedicated their lives to fighting crime and the forces of evil.
cast: Cathy Cavadini|Tara Strong|Elizabeth Daily|Roger Jackson|Tom Kane|Tom Kenny|Jennifer Hale|Jennifer Martin|Jeff Bennett|Grey Griffin|Phil LaMarr|Rob Paulsen|Kevin Michael Richardson|Frank Welker
keywords: cartoon network|cult tv|superhero crying|gender in title|origin of heroine
title: Las supernenas: La película
